Text: HolyRoses - it would be very helpful if you were to refrain from stating in the description of your uploads that they are "designed for direct playback on ... PS3" as your rips ARE NOT AT ALL PS3 COMPATIBLE. This would prevent much wasted time and bandwidth. Thank you.
whats not compatible about it?  i can't control cinavia protection and neither can anyone else.  there are workarounds on youtube that will make the video play on your ps3.  stop complaining.
